title: Haunted by Us: Elation
description: Aaron is ready for his happily ever after and everyone has an opinion about it. What’s a guy to do? Elope.“I can just see Allie now when I tell her we’re eloping. I value my life too much.”Kent craves a happy life with a happy wife, but does Sage know all his secrets? Would she still love him if she did? He almost lost her once, would he survive losing her again?"I can't be without you. It's too late. I've forgotten how.”Happily ever after comes with a price and everything is on the line.Will the Wade brothers finally have elation or will their lives be forever shattered?
author: Rebel Wild
